title: Robotic Weeder
summary: An affordable and adjustable robotic platform to enable small farmers to automate farm tasks. Currenlty developing a weeder attachment for the platform.

title: Pool Shooting Robot
summary: Standalone pool (billiards) playing robot that can be used with any table and is the size of standard pool cue.

title: SpaceX Intern Project
summary: Automated Starlink Mini dish transfer with pneumatic actuators and a high-speed gantry; achieved 2000 units/hr throughput with zero failures in 50k cycles.

title: Tesla Intern Project
summary: Created an automated 4K imaging system for drivetrain components and designed a new differential housing.

title: Zipline Intern Project
summary: Designed 18 injection-molded parts and assembly fixtures for the drone electrical systems; optimized for flight, thermal, and safety requirements.

title: 6-DOF Surgical Arm Kinematics
summary: Simulated the Mitsubishi PA-10C arm with inverse kinematics and collision avoidance for neuroendoscopy insertion paths.

title: Tendon Driven Guidewires
summary: Developed and evaluated tendon attachment methods for guidewires with knots, epoxy, and laser-cut micro plates.

title: Custom Drone and Flight Controller
summary: Built a $300 drone with custom ESP-8266 flight controller and 3D-printed components.

title: Boston Scientific Intern Project
summary: Optimized catheter sensor manufacturing with custom vacuum fixtures; improved throughput 10Ã— and reduced scrap 80%.

title: Wearable Stethoscope
summary: Developed wearable stethoscopes for COPD and CVD detection; fabricated nano-devices and applied MATLAB signal processing.

title: ME 2110 Class Robot
summary: Constructed a task-performing robot for ME 2110 with 3D-printed and laser-cut parts; programmed autonomous operations in Arduino IDE.

title: FIRST FTC Robotics - Ultimate Goal
summary: Designed and programmed FTC Ultimate Goal robot using odometry and OpenCV for autonomous ring shooting. Designed a self-aligning turret

title: FIRST FTC Robotics - Skystone
summary: Developed FTC Skystone robot with passthrough intake and dual lift for block stacking

title: Tracking Microscope
summary: Developed a low-cost object tracking microscope to enable researchers to observe microogranisms for long periods of time.

title: FIRST FTC Robotics - Rover Ruckus
summary: Built multi-object intake for FTC Rover Ruckus robot with filtering scoop and lift.
